text:
(7/8) #EarthDay21
This talk from the @EnvAgency asks & try‚Äôs to answer the big questions: what we can do to try & improve our climate and world?

It's a really good introduction to get students thinking about preventing, and preparing for, climate change: https://t.co/wjkutkZsKB https://t.co/lYZEp2PPKZ
@Ben_McGrail @EnvAgencySW And not even having to wear waders!
RT @johncurtinEA: Ok these opportunities don‚Äôt come around too often. How‚Äôd you like to lead the EA team improving our capital‚Äôs environmen‚Ä¶
Beautiful day to be on the Somerset Levels - @mattcardy and I are finding out how @EnvAgencySW would cope if one of the major pumping stations here went down. https://t.co/s1FBEa3C2f

text:
(4/8) #EarthDay2021 üåé
We also have 2 talks from the @EnvAgency on preventing plastic pollution. The 1st talk explores microplastics, and the 2nd uses a freshwater case study to show the impacts of microplastics.

Talk 1: 
https://t.co/gjmId0C32T

Talk 2:
https://t.co/GI8IUBtFIv https://t.co/fXGbjGXzpu

text:
(3/8) #EarthDay2021

In this talk from the @EnvAgency, @JessicaHickie focuses upon plastics in real life, how it affects us, the environmental effects of plastic and what we can do about it as individuals and in the future.

Watch and share this talk: https://t.co/p8v4IqvXDP https://t.co/JeYrC4MFZ8
